channel.title: Need someone with experience? please
channel.description: Ok i have a window 7 to start off with runs on a 64 bit operating system brand new bought it today now i downloaded my friend download client and so did other people everyone can play it so can i but......... when i log in and play i walk around for a couple secs or attack a rock crab or any monster and the client shuts down n exits why is that?? Remeber i have a windows 7 64 operating system can anyone help please?

item.title: Need someone with experience? please
item.dc:creator: @julianx13 julianx13
item.description:
@julianx13 wrote:

its still hard fudge do u have teamviewer or msn? so you can help me ive been trying all day today

Read full topic

item.title: Need someone with experience? please
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

Right click your .bat and select ‘edit’, now once you have done that a text document should of opened.

You should see something along the lines of,

start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

You will want to change the, start javaw to this,

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe"

Or to your Javas file location.

Now for an alternative, you can download a .bat to .exe converter and convert your current .bat to a .exe. It should work fine after you complete one of those above. Good luck hun.

Read full topic
